SEARCH
Package network.rmi.server

Class Client

java.lang.Object
network.rmi.server.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
Remote, ClientInterface, ClientService
public class Client extends Object implements ClientService, ClientInterface
Class to represent a client connected to the server via rmi.
